String.string: Report to {@LinkCreature:248#2001#Tamur} at {@Rgn:48002$$Khanovar Citadel} that you've collected the Sarjalod Components.
Tell {@LinkCreature:248#2010#Kaia} at {@Rgn:48002$$Khanovar Citadel} that you're ready to fight the argons.
Head to the {@Rgn:9014001$$Khanovar Gauntlet} with {@LinkCreature:248#2010#Kaia}. [Speak with {@LinkCreature:248#2010#Goddess Kaia} to teleport to the Khanovar Gauntlet.]
Stand at {@LinkCreature:248#2001$$War Goddess Kaia}'s side and prepare for battle.
Defeat the swarming argons with {@LinkCreature:414#2001#Goddess Kaia} at {@Rgn:9014001$$Khanovar Gauntlet}.
